thread.title: Distinguish Between Being an Approachable Leader and Being a Friend
thread.title_full: Distinguish Between Being an Approachable Leader and Being a Friend

author: BizCast
title: Distinguish Between Being an Approachable Leader and Being a Friend
text:
Leadership Distinguish Between Being an Approachable Leader and Being a Friend CEO of Tanvas Greg Topel stresses the difference between having a balance of a life outside of work and the need to be a leader.   
Tanvas is redefining touch by enabling you to feel what you see on any touchscreen. Despite advances in graphics, sound and vibration, today’s touchscreen is a still just a static window to the digital world. CEO Greg Topel, stresses the difference between having a balance of a life outside of work and when you need to be a leader. The best piece of advice Topel could give is to be careful with some decisions you make and don’t take long to make them. How do Topel and his team stick to their goals? Click play to find out. 
Related: You Have To Learn To Get Along With Everybody
